summary: Comprehensive testing completed for ConstructOS project progress tracking app. All backend APIs functioning correctly with proper data handling, progress rollup, and report generation. Frontend UI working seamlessly with full navigation, interactive features, and responsive design.

design_issues.issue: React hydration warnings in console for span elements in table body - does not affect functionality

passed_tests: PUT /api/tasks/{id}/progress updates leaf tasks and triggers parent rollup
PUT /api/tasks/{id}/progress correctly rejects non-leaf task updates with 400
PUT /api/tasks/{id}/risk successfully flags tasks at-risk with notes
PUT /api/tasks/{id}/dates updates task start/end dates properly
Progress rollup functionality working - child updates propagate to parents
Dashboard page loads with all metrics, phase tiles, and charts
Task management page provides full CRUD operations
Gantt chart displays interactive timeline with zoom and filters
Reports page enables format selection and download preparation
Navigation between all 4 pages works seamlessly
Search and filtering functionality works across pages
Progress editing in task tree works for leaf tasks
Risk and date dialogs function properly
